sense.gloss: to think (about, of), to think over, to ponder, to contemplate, to reflect (on), to meditate (on)
to consider, to bear in mind, to allow for, to take into consideration
to think (that), to believe, to hold (a view), to judge, to conclude, to suspect
to intend (to do), to think of (doing), to plan
to predict, to anticipate, to expect, to imagine
to come up with, to think up, to contrive, to devise
to consider (as), to regard (as), to look on (as), to take, to view

sdata.j: ↑僕↑↓ぼく↓が↑最後↑↓さいご↓に↑自分↑↓じぶん↓の↑考↑↓かんが↓えを↑伝↑↓つた↓えた↑人↑↓ひと↓は、↑僕↑↓ぼく↓を↑気違↑↓きちが↓いだと↑思↑↓おも↓ったようだ。
sdata.e: The last person I told my idea to thought I was nuts.

sdata.j: ↑最悪↑↓さいあく↓の↑場合↑↓ばあい↓を↑考↑↓かんが↓えておこう。
sdata.e: Let's consider the worst that could happen.

sdata.j: ↑行↑↓い↓き↑過↑↓す↓ぎたものであっても、↑僕↑↓ぼく↓は↑自分↑↓じぶん↓の↑考↑↓かんが↓えをなくしたくない。
sdata.e: I don't want to lose my ideas, even though some of them are a bit extreme.

sdata.j: これ↑以上↑↓いじょう↓↑考↑↓かんが↓えても↑無駄↑↓むだ↓だ。
sdata.e: It's useless to keep on thinking any more.

sdata.j: ↑最近↑↓さいきん↓↑考↑↓かんが↓えることが↑多↑↓おお↓↑過↑↓す↓ぎる。
sdata.e: I have too many things on my mind these days.

sdata.j: ↑彼↑↓かれ↓らのコミュニケーションは↑我々↑↓われわれ↓が↑考↑↓かんが↓えてきたものよりはるかに↑複雑↑↓ふくざつ↓かもしれません。
sdata.e: Their communication may be much more complex than we thought.

sdata.j: いままで↑試↑↓ため↓してきた↑他↑↓ほか↓の↑政治↑↓せいじ↓↑形態↑↓けいたい↓を↑除↑↓のぞ↓いて↑考↑↓かんが↓えると、↑民主↑↓みんしゅ↓↑主義↑↓しゅぎ↓とは↑最低↑↓さいてい↓の↑政治↑↓せいじ↓↑形態↑↓けいたい↓だ。
sdata.e: Democracy is the worst form of government, except all the others that have been tried.

sdata.j: いい↑考↑↓かんが↓えですね。
「あの↑音↑↓おと↓で↑考↑↓かんが↓え↑事↑↓ごと↓ができないわ」と、↑彼女↑↓かのじょ↓はタイプライターを↑見↑↓み↓つめながら↑言↑↓い↓った。
sdata.e: I can't think with that noise, she said, as she stared at the typewriter.

words.gloss: to think (about, of), to think over, to ponder, to contemplate, to reflect (on), to meditate (on)
